data.name: Lamentum Artbook
data.detailed_description: An tome of dark and disturbing art that allows one to delve into the dark minds behind Lamentum.
data.about_the_game: An tome of dark and disturbing art that allows one to delve into the dark minds behind Lamentum.
data.short_description: An tome of dark and disturbing art that allows one to delve into the dark minds behind Lamentum.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish, Portuguese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Quad 2.7 Ghz, AMD Phenom(TM)II X4 3 Ghz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770, 1024 MB, Shader Model 3.0
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
